mlflex.core
Class TrainTestValidationAssignments

java.lang.Object
  mlflex.core.CrossValidationAssignments
      mlflex.core.TrainTestValidationAssignments

public class TrainTestValidationAssignments
extends CrossValidationAssignments

This class stores assignments of data instances to either training or testing groups. It is used when cross-validation is NOT performed (or you can think of it as one-fold cross-validation).

Author:
Stephen Piccolo
